thread.title: Hondo rolling with Jays
thread.title_full: Hondo rolling with Jays | New York Post

author: Hondo
title: Hondo rolling with Jays
text:
Resilient Hondo bounced back from his disappointing 2-for-5 showing on Sunday by sweeping with the Eagles and Blue Jays to lower the deficit to 1,682 wathans.
Tuesday night: Mr. Aitch is issuing a tall order to the Jays — stick it to Chris Young — 20 units on Dickey.
The Kardashians are said to be very grateful Lamar Odom is making progress. For a while there, as they were congregating at the hospital, they were missing some very important photo-ops … Hillary Clinton failed to increase her lead in the polls over the Doddering Old Socialist, Bernie Sanders, despite the media’s unanimous opinion she had a great debate. It just proves, no matter what you do, there’s no way to fix unlikable … The Yankees are in the market for another hitting coach, which will be their third in three years. At some point, you’d think the bulk of the blame for perennially weak offensive production would shift to the guy who signs the hitters and coaches.
